thread.title: Owning a Stake in a Startup Great Path to Riches. But Mainly for Men.

author: Sarah Kunst
title: Owning a Stake in a Startup Great Path to Riches. But Mainly for Men.
text: Sarah Kunst is an investor and entrepreneur. She can be reached at@sarahkunst. Modern tech culture has a seductive promise: put in years of effort building a product or network and be rewarded handsomely. However, like so much of tech, the gains are not meritocratically divided among smart, hungry, ambitious people. In addition to the predominantly The Gender Pay Gap Is a Lot Bigger Than You Think
